duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure location compliance with financial reporting, GAAP, SOX, and company policies.
Prepare budgets, forecasts, and financial statements, and ensure financial accountability.
Provide financial leadership for project evaluation, planning, and investment.
Develop and maintain department rate file and prepare annual tax packages.
Manage and develop finance staff, providing coaching, mentoring, and annual evaluation.
Work closely with Sales to ensure accurate information for government contracts.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in Finance or Business, MBA a plus.
